topic: Advances in sodium batteries and manufacturing at scale - implications for lithium and other battery types
plan_detail: Investigate recent academic and technical breakthroughs in sodium-ion chemistries, specifically focusing on cathode stability (layered oxides, Prussian blue) and anode efficiency (hard carbon).
Map the commercial landscape, identifying key companies scaling production, factory locations, and announced capacity targets.
Perform a comparative analysis of SIBs against incumbent technologies (Lithium-ion LFP/NMC) focusing on economics and performance metrics.
Analyze the implications for the wider battery market, specifically the impact on critical mineral demand (Lithium, Cobalt) and supply chain resilience.
